items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY comfortable,soft Against the skin!!!
items.body: Very soft fabric, love the purple color! Washes and tumble dries beautifully! I have received so many complements when I wear this lightweight sweater. Fits true to size Read more
items.author: Lisa M Robinson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Sweater
items.body: This sweater is a nice weight, not too thick or thin. It is super soft and comfortable. I purchased the beige color. It is a nice length and purchase. It fit true to size. Read more
items.author: Thankful One

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good choice, nice for the price.
items.body: This is a nice, light weight sweater/shirt. comfortable, soft material. 5'4", 140lbs, 38C, ordered a medium which fit perfectly to size. Good quality for the price. selected the blue grey color, its very pretty and the color stayed vibrant after washing. Fold marks take a while to disappear due to vacuum packaging. Overall a good choice. Read more
items.author: Kid Charlemagne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight, soft, perfect feel on the skin. Love the sweater
items.body: I love this sweater. I bought two one year ago and have bought additional three ( 3 ) in different colors this year. It flows beautify around the body. It is very soft and feels great to a touch. If you have a sensitive skin or skin prone to eczema this would be a perfect top ! However, these sweaters are not thick, they are almost sheer and flowing so if you want a heavy sweater that's not for you. Also they run roomy to the size. I am 5'4 tall 126 lb. so, according to size chart I should wear " Medium ", however the M size is too big for me. Size Small fits perfect. Read more
items.author: M. Adams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, soft, and cozy
items.body: I love how lightweight the sweater is and yet very soft and cozy. It fits true to size and is good quality. I'd definitely recommend if you're looking for a lighter sweater. I bought the purple one when I saw how lovely this one fit. Read more
items.author: Dorothy Paul

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great top
items.body: Super cute and comfy. Inside is smooth and soft. True to size. Read more
items.author: Kelley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great warm sweater.
items.body: Love this purple sweater. It is very soft and fits true to size. I wear a 12 to 14 and ordered an XL, it fits great. It’s stretchy just in case you need a little extra. Read more
items.author: Sherri

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super soft & lightweight sweater
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Super cute, very soft and lightweight sweater. True to size as an oversized fit. I will say the material looks like it will pill very easily after a wash or two. I love the neckline and button detail. Very comfortable and perfect for transitional fall weather. Read more
items.author: Christina

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gray, Blue, Apricot, Black, Deep Apricot, White Floral, Coffee, Charcoal Gray, Red, Blue Gray, Khaki, Purple, Rose Pink, Caramel. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
